extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, potentially harming your own well-being and temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, particularly when it comes to leisurely activities or socializing?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I allowed excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my financial responsibilities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I allowed excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my financial obligations, putting at risk my ability to provide for those in need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' private affairs or speaking about their faults
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs or speaking about their faults, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
during social gatherings or conversations with close acquaintances
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, during social gatherings or conversations with close acquaintances?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing my friends ' faults or private affairs
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing my friends' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did you allow Sunday to be a day of rest, especially when it could have been avoided through other means?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: on a holy day when it could be avoided
impiety.question: Did you allow yourself to rest on a holy day when it could be avoided, thus violating the Lord's command to keep the Sabbath?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

anger.question: Have I nursed feelings of anger against those closest to me, rather than seeking reconciliation?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
